[[inst_bstart]]
==== BSTART

*Syntax:* BSTART {DIRECT, CALL}, <label>

*Description:* Block Start: marks the beginning of a template block with execution hint.

image::../generated/encodings/enc_bstart.svg[BSTART encoding,width=800]

*Group:* CMD/BLOCK_SPLIT
